Description:
A Stock listed Company is offering career opportunity at corporate office based in Jeddah. Here is brief outline of job responsibilities:-·       Corporate Governance policies and procedures framework.
Update the Corporate Governance Manual and Guidelines.
Manage day-to-day operations of the Governance.
Prepare and present updates for quarterly meetings .
Respond to alleged violations of rules, regulations, policies, procedures, and standards of conduct.
Keep abreast of regulatory and industry trends.
Work with internal control functions.
Review to update the related policies and procedures.
Maintain Governance framework for subsidiaries.
Conduct orientation sessions for employees.
Stay abreast of key regulatory developments.Skills
Skills: Preferably Graduate in Law, with 3-5 years’ related work experience.

Good understanding of procedures and local regulations.
Capable of developing and applying relevant policies and procedures.
Organized person possesses good communication (Bilingual) and interpersonal skills.
Skilled in governance issues with ability to make positive contribution.
Quick, resourceful and influential person with ability to work under pressure.
Good negotiation analytical, leadership and management skills.
